services.title: Nail bar
services.name: Medicure, Pedicure and Gel nails
services.summary: High quality nail service and experienced beauty therapist will look after your nails. We offer a stunning variety of colours and finishes. We operate to the highest standards in health and hygiene. All tools are single use, and pedicure baths are thoroughly sanitised and disinfected.
